00016                                                         // declared in BVThread

00023 // cBasicViewer constructor
00024 // Author: Thiago C. Martins
00025 // last updated: 22/7/1998
00026 //
00030 //
00031 cBasicViewer::cBasicViewer(int Width, int Height, char *title)
00032 {
00033         // Sets the width and height
00034         this->width = max(Width,120);   // Minimum size is 120x100
00035         this->height = max(Height,100); // max() is a Win32 macro defined
00036                                                                         // in windows.h
00037         
00038         // Sets the title
00039         strcpy(this->title, title);
00040         
00041         // Creates the mutexes
00042         DCMutex=CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
00043         RunMutex=CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
00044 
00045         // Creates the thread
00046         _beginthread((void (*)(void *))ViewerThreadProcess, 0, this); 
00047         // Waits until the thread gets the RunMutex
00048         while(WaitForSingleObject(RunMutex,0)!=WAIT_TIMEOUT)
00049                 ReleaseMutex(RunMutex);
00050         // Waits until the thread creates a message loop
00051         while(!PostThreadMessage(ThreadID, TH_MESSAGE, TH_CHECK, NULL))
00052                 Sleep(0);
00053         // At this point, the thread should already has created
00054         // the window, the memory device context and 
00055         // started the message loop.
00056 }
00057 
00058 // cBasicViewer destructor
00059 // Author: Thiago C. Martins
00060 // last updated: 22/7/1998
00061 //
00065 //
00066 cBasicViewer::~cBasicViewer()
00067 {
00068         // Sends TH_DIE to the thread
00069         PostThreadMessage(ThreadID, TH_MESSAGE, TH_DIE, NULL);
00070         // Waits the thread to die
00071         WaitForSingleObject(RunMutex, INFINITE);
00072         // At this point, the thread should already has destroyed the 
00073         // window and the memory device context.
00074 }
00075 
00076 // BeginDraw Method
00077 // Author: Thiago C. Martins
00078 // last updated: 22/07/1998
00079 //
00083 //
00084 HDC cBasicViewer::BeginDraw()
00085 {
00086         // Gets the DCMutex
00087         WaitForSingleObject(DCMutex, INFINITE);
00088         // Now, the thread souldn't access the memory device context
00089         // until EndPaint is called.
00090         return hMemDC;
00091 }
00092 
00093 // EndDraw Method
00094 // Author: Thiago C. Martins
00095 // last updated: 22/07/1998
00096 //
00100 //
00101 void cBasicViewer::EndDraw()
00102 {
00103         // Just releases the DCMutex
00104         ReleaseMutex(DCMutex);
00105         // Now, the thread can access the memory device context again
00106 }

00114 void cBasicViewer::Show()
00115 {
00116         // Sends TH_SHOW to the thread
00117         PostThreadMessage(ThreadID, TH_MESSAGE, TH_SHOW, NULL);
00118 }

00144 // RegisterViewerClass Method
00145 // Author: Thiago C. Martins
00146 // last updated: 22/07/1998
00147 //
00149 //
00150 void cBasicViewer::RegisterViewerClass()
00151 {
00152         WNDCLASS wc;
00153         if(!Registered) {       // If the class hasn't been registered...
00154 
00155                 // Get the current module instance
00156                 ModuleInstance = (HINSTANCE)GetModuleHandle(NULL);
00157                 
00158                 // Initializes the window class
00159                 wc.style = CS_OWNDC | BV_CLASSSTYLE;            // Requires an own
00160                                                                                                         // device context
00161                 wc.lpfnWndProc = (WNDPROC)ViewerWndProc;
00162                 wc.cbClsExtra = 0;
00163                 wc.cbWndExtra = 0;
00164                 wc.hInstance = ModuleInstance;
00165                 wc.hIcon = VIEWER_ICON();
00166                 wc.hCursor = VIEWER_CURSOR();
00167                 // Don't repaint the background
00168                 wc.hbrBackground = NULL;
00169                 wc.lpszMenuName = NULL;
00170                 wc.lpszClassName = ClassName;
00171         
00172                 // Registers the window class
00173                 RegisterClass(&wc);
00174 
00175                 Registered = true;
00176         }
00177 }
